articles.author: Dario Radley
articles.title: Mystery hominin skull discovered in 1960 dated to at least 286,000 years old - Archaeology News Online Magazine
articles.description: New study dates the Petralona skull up to 539,000 years old, offering fresh insight into Europe’s human evolution mystery.
articles.content: A mystery in human evolution may be close to being solved, thanks to a new study by the Institut de Paléontologie Humaine in France. A nearly complete cranium discovered in 1960 inside the Petralona … [+3269 chars]
